title: Client Crashed in Champ Select for S1 promos?
body:
Hi,

so as I got 100 lp and entered my promos for S1, my client has crashed after I select my champion.  This has happened both times I got into my S1 promos, giving me an immediate loss for the first game.  Does anyone know why this is happening, and only when I'm in my S1 promos?  I feel like somebody does not want me to reach gold :(

replies.body:
Sounds like an unstable connection with LoL servers resulting in a disconnect from champ select.

[Troubleshoot your connectivity issues.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues)

http://na.leagueoflegends.com/sites/default/files/styles/scale_xlarge/public/upload/su16_keyart_1920x1080_0.jpg?itok=6nj8mHjj
That's most likely it, but for it to only ever happen in these promos is pretty suspicious if you ask me...

I agree that a poor connection to the servers is the most likely cause here. I can assure you that Riot is not part of some sort of dark conspiracy to prevent you from reaching your goal of hitting Gold this season. :P

The problem with connection issues is that they can come and go, much like the tides of the ocean. I definitely recommend working through the guide that *Rineyy* linked, as it addresses the most frequent fixes for this situation. 

If you continue to see this issue after working through those steps, please let me know.
I'll definitely try the troubleshooting tips, thank you!
